 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמַח‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמֵ֑ח‎</span><sub>154</sub> **verb** ==rejoice, be glad== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; compare perhaps Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šamâ—u***</u></abbr>, ***flourish***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be high, proud***; Punic proper name, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שמחת‎</span>); — 

**Qal**<sub>126</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמַח‎</span> [[Ps.16.9|Ps 16:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׂמֵ֑חַ‎</span> consecutive [[Prov.29.6|Prov 29:6]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמֵ֑חָה‎</span> [[Esth.8.15|Esth 8:15]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Deut.12.18|Deut 12:18]] +; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמֵ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Neh.12.43|Neh 12:43]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂמַח‎</span> [[Isa.9.16|Isa 9:16]] +, 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂמָ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Isa.65.13|Isa 65:13]]; [[Ps.69.33|Ps 69:33]], 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׂמַחְנָה‎</span> [[2Sam.1.20|2Sam 1:20]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמַח‎</span> [[Deut.33.18|Deut 33:18]] +, feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂמְחִי‎</span> [[Zeph.3.14|Zeph 3:14]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמָ֑חִי‎</span> [[Joel.2.21|Joel 2:21]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמֹחַ‎</span> [[Ezek.35.14|Ezek 35:14]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמֵחַ‎</span> adjective; — 24 t. \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גיל‎</span>, less often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָנַן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַז‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂישׂ‎</span>, etc.; — 

**1.** in common life: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***rejoice***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person or of thing ***take pleasure in*** [[Judg.9.19|Judg 9:19]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.33.18|Deut 33:18]]; [[Eccl.3.22|Eccl 3:22]] + 7 t. + (probably) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָליָֿמֵינוּ‎</span> [[Ps.90.14|Ps 90:14]] (others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> temporal), compare [[Eccl.11.8|Eccl 11:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Isa.39.2|Isa 39:2]] + \|\| [[2Kgs.20.13|2Kgs 20:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וישׂמח‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וישׁמע‎</span> [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] modern), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing [[Jonah.4.6|Jonah 4:6]]; [[2Chr.15.15|2Chr 15:15]] with temporal clause [[Jer.41.13|Jer 41:13]] + 6 t. + (of heart) [[Prov.23.15|Prov 23:15]], in one's heart [[Exod.4.14|Exod 4:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי‎</span> ***because*** [[Isa.14.29|Isa 14:29]] + 3 t.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> ***with*** [[Isa.66.10|Isa 66:10]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person ***get pleasure from*** [[Prov.5.18|Prov 5:18]] absolute [[1Sam.11.9|1Sam 11:9]]; [[Eccl.3.12|Eccl 3:12]]; [[Prov.13.9|Prov 13:9]] (figurative of prosperity; subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺר‎</span>; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּעַךְ‎</span>), + 8 t.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing ***at*** [[Job.21.12|Job 21:12]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***rejoice*** arrogantly, ***exult*** at, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, [[Mic.7.8|Mic 7:8]]; [[Isa.14.8|Isa 14:8]]; [[Obad.1.12|Obad 1:12]]; [[Ps.35.19|Ps 35:19]]; [[Ps.35.24|Ps 35:24]]; [[Ps.38.17|Ps 38:17]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> of thing [[Ezek.25.6|Ezek 25:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing [[Job.31.29|Job 31:29]]; [[Ps.35.15|Ps 35:15]]; [[Prov.24.17|Prov 24:17]] absolute [[Hos.9.1|Hos 9:1]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלגִּֿיל‎</span>), [[2Sam.1.20|2Sam 1:20]] + 3 t., + (said of righteous by Eliphaz) [[Job.22.19|Job 22:19]]. 

**2. a.** ***rejoice*** religiously, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing [[1Sam.2.1|1Sam 2:1]]; [[Deut.12.7|Deut 12:7]]; [[Ps.21.2|Ps 21:2]] + 7 t.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בי‎</span>, etc., [[Joel.2.23|Joel 2:23]]; [[Ps.32.11|Ps 32:11]] + 10 t. Psalms + [[Ps.9.3|Ps 9:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶעֶלְצָה בָ֑ךְ‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing [[2Chr.29.36|2Chr 29:36]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> infinitive [[1Chr.29.9|1Chr 29:9]] a; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַעַן‎</span> of thing [[Ps.48.12|Ps 48:12]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי‎</span> ***because*** [[Ps.119.74|Ps 119:74]] absolute [[Zech.2.14|Zech 2:14]]; [[Zech.4.10|Zech 4:10]]; [[Joel.2.21|Joel 2:21]]; [[1Chr.29.9|1Chr 29:9]]b (with accusative of congnate meaning with verb), [[1Chr.16.31|1Chr 16:31]] (of heavens) = [[Ps.96.11|Ps 96:11]]; [[Ps.97.1|Ps 97:1]] (isles) + 18 t. (12 t. Psalms), + (of heart) [[Zech.10.7|Zech 10:7]] a [[Ps.16.9|Ps 16:9]]; [[1Chr.16.10|1Chr 16:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָללֵֿב‎</span> [[Zeph.3.14|Zeph 3:14]] (compare [[Exod.4.14|Exod 4:14]] **1 a** above); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span> [[Isa.9.2|Isa 9:2]] and (of joyous feasting etc., at sanctuary) [[Lev.23.40|Lev 23:40]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Deut.12.12|Deut 12:12]]; [[Deut.12.18|Deut 12:18]]; [[Deut.16.11|Deut 16:11]]; [[Deut.27.7|Deut 27:7]], compare [[Deut.14.26|Deut 14:26]]; [[1Sam.11.15|1Sam 11:15]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Isa.9.16|Isa 9:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחם‎</span>; [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>RÉJ xxxiv. 63</sup> ***be gentle***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing [[Ps.104.31|Ps 104:31]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשִׂמַּח‎</span> consecutive [[Deut.24.5|Deut 24:5]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁמְּחָהוּ‎</span> [[Jer.20.15|Jer 20:15]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׂמַּח‎</span> [[Ps.104.15|Ps 104:15]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂמֵּחַ‎</span> [[Ps.86.4|Ps 86:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂמַּח‎</span> [[Prov.27.11|Prov 27:11]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂמֵּחַ‎</span> [[Jer.20.15|Jer 20:15]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂמֵּחַ‎</span> [[Judg.9.13|Judg 9:13]], plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂמְּחֵי‎</span> [[Ps.19.9|Ps 19:9]] — ***cause to rejoice, gladden***, with accusative of person (or equivalent ), subject person [[Deut.24.5|Deut 24:5]]; [[Jer.20.15|Jer 20:15]] (+ Infinitive absolute), [[Prov.10.1|Prov 10:1]]; [[Prov.15.20|Prov 15:20]]; [[Prov.27.11|Prov 27:11]]; [[Prov.29.3|Prov 29:3]] ([[Hos.7.3|Hos 7:3]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁח‎</span> **2**); especially subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (God) [[Jer.31.13|Jer 31:13]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> separ.) [[Isa.56.7|Isa 56:7]]; [[2Chr.20.27|2Chr 20:27]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source, see **Qal 1 a**), [[Ezra.6.22|Ezra 6:22]]; [[Neh.12.43|Neh 12:43]] (+ accusative of congnate meaning with verb) [[Ps.86.4|Ps 86:4]]; [[Ps.90.15|Ps 90:15]]; [[Ps.92.5|Ps 92:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> instrumental), also, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person ***cause to exult at*** [[Ps.30.2|Ps 30:2]], ***id.*** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Lam.2.17|Lam 2:17]] subject of thing [[Judg.9.13|Judg 9:13]]; [[Ps.19.9|Ps 19:9]]; [[Ps.45.9|Ps 45:9]]; [[Ps.46.5|Ps 46:5]]; [[Ps.104.15|Ps 104:15]]; [[Eccl.10.19|Eccl 10:19]]; [[Prov.12.25|Prov 12:25]]; [[Prov.15.30|Prov 15:30]]; [[Prov.27.9|Prov 27:9]]. **Hiph\`il = Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׂמַחְתָּ‎</span> [[Ps.89.43|Ps 89:43]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>).
